title: Calculator
description: Tired of mathing points out? Push all of that labour onto online points calculator

title: Gamblers mark & fish markets
description: Fish market: replaces secondary tarot hand with shared shop. Gamblers mark: Introduces new d6 based modifier

title: Fukuzatsu+
description: Fukuzatsu, the real life balatro inspired poker extravaganza!

title: Fukuzatsu pocket guide
description: Card sized rules compatable to be used in conbini

title: Fukuzatsu tarot augments + quick reference
description: Tarot card augments: Cut-and-stick printable effects for Fukuzatsu rules. Quick reference: Suit themes, extended hand guide, and chip values.

title: Soloterrare
description: Poker survival horror rouge-like using physical playing cards.

title: Attaccarat
description: An expansion for the craziest poker game that lets you attack and defend as though in a war of suits.

title: Conbini
description: A card-sized expansion for Fukuzatsu that adds a shop function to games.

title: Gaffukuzatsu
description: Micro-expansion that aims to make these gaff cards compatible with the game at large.
